pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonlinear Cointegrating Autoregressive Distributed Lag Model // Computes the nonlinear cointegrating autoregressive distributed lag model with automatic bases aic and bic lags selection of independent variables proposed by (Shin, Yu Greenwood-Nimmo, 2014 doi:10.1007/978-1-4899-8008-3_9).
